description: This file defines an interface class IOmiProxy within the omi namespace, which provides methods for mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners. It is designed as a wrapper around an omi_dbus_api, simplifying method calls and signal handling for OMI-related operations.

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface for proxy operations related to OMI, including mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID, filesystem image path, and config path; outputs the decrypted config bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle identified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener based on its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
